name: Welcome To A Strange World
description:
Game Story - You crash landed on a strange world. You got separated from your ship, and your only hope of repairing it is bringing it an artifact from this world.

Controls - 

WASD - Move, Space Bar - Jump, Left Click - Shoot/Pickup Object, Right Click - Throw Object

Credits

Coding/Game Design - Jack Salgado

Art - Dante Lundell & Buch
